item.title: è®­ç»ƒ PINN æ¥åæ¼”æœªçŸ¥å‚æ•°
item.description:
æˆ‘ä½¿ç”¨ PINN æ±‚è§£é˜»å°¼æŒ¯è¡å™¨å¾®åˆ†æ–¹ç¨‹ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶ä»¥é˜»å°¼æŒ¯è¡å™¨çš„å™ªå£°è§‚æµ‹ä½œä¸ºè¾“å…¥ï¼Œæ‰¾åˆ°åè€…çš„æ‘©æ“¦å‚æ•°ã€‚æˆ‘ä½¿ç”¨è‡ªå®šä¹‰è®­ç»ƒç¨‹åºåœ¨ Tensorflow ä¸­ç¼–å†™äº†ä»£ç ã€‚é—®é¢˜æ˜¯æˆ‘å®šä¹‰çš„å¯è®­ç»ƒå‚æ•°æ²¡æœ‰æ¥è¿‘æˆ‘ä»å™ªå£°è§‚æµ‹ä¸­çŸ¥é“çš„æ­£ç¡®å€¼ã€‚æœ€ç»ˆï¼ŒPINN çš„è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆå®Œå…¨ä¸æ­£ç¡®ã€‚ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œæˆ‘çš„ä»£ç è¿è¡Œå¾—å¾ˆå¥½ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦å¯»æ‰¾å¯è®­ç»ƒå‚æ•°ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯è¿™é‡Œçš„æ‘©æ“¦å‚æ•°ã€‚ # NN æŒ¯è¡å™¨ç³»ç»Ÿçš„å®ç° def rocks_system_data_loss(t, net, func, params, mu, bc, t_data, u_data, lambda1): t = t.reshape(-1,1) t = tf.constant(t, dtype = tf.float32) t_0 = tf.zeros((1,1))
# 2nd å¯¼æ•°çš„åµŒå¥—å¾ªç¯ with tf.GradientTape() as outer_tape: outer_tape.watch(t)
with tf.GradientTape() as inner_tape: inner_tape.watch(t) x = net(t)
dx_dt = inner_tape.gradient(x, t) # 1stå¯¼æ•°
d2x_dt2 = outer_tape.gradient(dx_dt, t) # äºŒé˜¶å¯¼æ•°
# è¾¹ç•ŒæŸå¤± bc_loss_1 = tf.square(net(t_0) - bc[0]) bc_loss_2 = tf.square(dx_dt[0] - bc[1])
# å¯å­¦ä¹ å‚æ•° mu ä¼ é€’ç»™ ODE ode_loss = d2x_dt2 - func(x, dx_dt, params[0], mu, params[2])
# è¶…å‚æ•° lambda1 çš„æ•°æ®æŸå¤± data_loss = u_data - net(t_data)
square_loss = tf.square(ode_loss) + lambda1*tf.square(data_loss) + bc_loss_1 + bc_loss_2 total_loss = tf.reduce_mean(square_loss)
return total_loss, mu
# å¸¦æœ‰æ•°æ®ä¸¢å¤±çš„è®­ç»ƒç¨‹åº def train_NN_data_loss(epochs, optm, NN, func, bc, lambda1, train_t, train_u, data_t, data_u, data_u_noised, test_t_plot, true_u_plot, testing_t): train_loss_record = [] loss_tracker = plotting_points(epochs)
mu = tf.Variable(initial_value=tf.ones((1,1)), trainable=True, dtype=tf.float32) mu_list = []
waiting = 200 best = float('inf')
early_stop = 0
for itr in range(epochs): with tf.GradientTape() as tape: #tape.watch(mu) train_loss, mu = rocksor_system_data_loss(train_t, NNï¼Œfuncï¼Œparamsï¼Œmuï¼Œbcï¼Œdata_tï¼Œdata_u_noisedï¼Œlambda1) train_loss_record.append(train_loss)
grad_w = tape.gradient(train_lossï¼ŒNN.trainable_variables + [mu]) optm.apply_gradients(zip(grad_wï¼ŒNN.trainable_variables + [mu]))
if itr in loss_tracker: print(train_loss.numpy()) print(mu.numpy()) plot_epochs_with_noise(train_tï¼Œtrain_uï¼Œdata_tï¼Œdata_u_noisedï¼Œtest_t_plotï¼Œtrue_u_plotï¼Œtesting_tï¼Œitrï¼ŒNN)
mu_list.append(mu.numpy())
# æå‰åœæ­¢ # wait += 1 # if train_loss.numpy() < best: # best = train_loss.numpy() # wait = 0 # if wait >= waiting: # print(f"åœ¨è¿­ä»£ {itr} æ—¶åœæ­¢ï¼ŒæŸå¤±ä¸º {train_loss_record[itr]}ã€‚") # early_stop = itr # break
return train_loss_record, mu_list, early_stop
# ç”¨äº ODE æŸå¤±è®¡ç®—/æœ€å°åŒ– NN_osc_func = lambda x, dx_dt, k, d, m: -k/m*x - d/m*dx_dt
æ‚¨å¯ä»¥åœ¨æ­¤å¤„çœ‹åˆ° 6000 ä¸ª epoch åçš„ç»“æœã€‚ç¥ç»ç½‘ç»œæ­£åœ¨æ”¶æ•›åˆ°ä¸€æ¡æ°´å¹³çº¿ï¼Œè¯¯å·®ä¸º 5.76ï¼Œå‚æ•°ä¼°è®¡ä¸º 0.84ï¼Œå°½ç®¡æ­£ç¡®å€¼ä¸º 4ã€‚è¿™æ˜¯æˆ‘çš„é˜»å°¼æŒ¯è¡å™¨è®¾ç½®ï¼š k = 400 d = 4 m = 1 y0 = np.array([1.0, 0.0])
é”™è¯¯ç»“æœã€‚ ç›¸åº”æŸå¤±ã€‚ ä¸å¹¸çš„æ˜¯ï¼Œæ­¤æ—¶æˆ‘ä¸çŸ¥é“é—®é¢˜å¯èƒ½æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆã€‚æˆ‘å°è¯•æ›´æ”¹ NN_osc_funcï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨ä¸¤ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨äº† tape.gradient()ã€‚å¦‚èƒ½å¾—åˆ°ä»»ä½•å¸®åŠ©ï¼Œæˆ‘å°†ä¸èƒœæ„Ÿæ¿€ã€‚è°¢è°¢ï¼

model = torch.hub.load('.', 'custom', path='yolov9-inst/runs/train-seg/gelan-c-seg15/weights/best.pt', source='local') # Image img = 'WALL-INSTANCEE-2/test/images/5a243513a69b150001f56c31_emptyroom6_jpeg_jpg.rf.7aa8f6a9aefbb1c76adc60a7b392dcd6.jpg' # æ¨ç† res = model(img)

item.title: ValueErrorï¼šæœªåœ¨æœªçŸ¥çš„ TensorShape ä¸Šå®šä¹‰ as_list()ã€‚å›¾åƒå’Œæ©ç å½¢çŠ¶çœ‹èµ·æ¥æ­£ç¡®
item.description:
æˆ‘æ­£å°è¯•è°ƒæ•´ Tensorflow çš„ç¤ºä¾‹ UNet ä»¥è¾¾åˆ°æˆ‘çš„ç›®çš„ã€‚ä¸»è¦åŒºåˆ«åœ¨äºï¼Œæ­¤ UNet é‡‡ç”¨ 128x128 å›¾åƒå’Œæ©ç ï¼Œè€Œæˆ‘çš„å›¾åƒä¸º 512x512ï¼Œæ©ç ä¸º 100x100ã€‚ å°è¯•è¿è¡Œ model.fit æ—¶å‡ºç°æ­¤é”™è¯¯ï¼š ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- ValueError Tracebackï¼ˆæœ€è¿‘ä¸€æ¬¡è°ƒç”¨æœ€åä¸€æ¬¡ï¼‰ Cell In[137]ï¼Œç¬¬ 2 è¡Œ 1 # %%wandb ----> 2 model_history = model.fit(train_dataset, epochs=EPOCHS, 3 steps_per_epoch=STEPS_PER_EPOCH, 4 validation_steps=VALIDATION_STEPS, 5 validation_data=test_dataset, 6 callbacks = [ShapeLoggingCallback()]) 7 #callbacks=[CustomCallback()]) # original: callbacks=[DisplayCallback()])

ValueErrorï¼šas_list() æœªåœ¨æœªçŸ¥çš„ TensorShape ä¸Šå®šä¹‰ã€‚
ä½†æ˜¯ï¼Œæˆ‘å¯ä»¥æ¯«æ— é—®é¢˜åœ°è¿è¡Œ model.predictï¼Œå®ƒä¼šç”Ÿæˆæˆ‘æœŸæœ›çš„æœªç»è®­ç»ƒçš„æ¨¡å‹çš„é¢„æµ‹ã€‚ è¿™æ˜¯æˆ‘ç”¨æ¥åˆ¶ä½œå’Œè®­ç»ƒæ¨¡å‹çš„ä»£ç ï¼š base_model = tf.keras.applications.MobileNetV2(input_shape=[512, 512, 3], include_top=False)
# ä½¿ç”¨è¿™äº›å±‚çš„æ¿€æ´» layer_names = [ 'block_1_expand_relu', # 64x64 'block_3_expand_relu', # 32x32 'block_6_expand_relu', # 16x16 'block_13_expand_relu', # 8x8 'block_16_project', # 4x4 ] base_model_outputs = [base_model.get_layer(name).output for name in layer_names]
# åˆ›å»ºç‰¹å¾æå–æ¨¡å‹ down_stack = tf.keras.Model(inputs=base_model.input, output=base_model_outputs)
down_stack.trainable = False
up_stack = [ pix2pix.upsample(512, 3), # 4x4 -> 8x8 pix2pix.upsample(256, 3), # 8x8 -> 16x16 pix2pix.upsample(128, 3), # 16x16 -> 32x32 pix2pix.upsample(64, 3), # 32x32 -> 64x64 ]
def unet_model(output_channels:int): input = tf.keras.layers.Input(shape=[512, 512, 3])
# é€šè¿‡æ¨¡å‹è¿›è¡Œä¸‹é‡‡æ · skips = down_stack(inputs) x = skips[-1] skips = reversed(skips[:-1])
# ä¸Šé‡‡æ ·å¹¶å»ºç«‹ skip è¿æ¥ for up, skip in zip(up_stack, skips): x = up(x) concat = tf.keras.layers.Concatenate() x = concat([x, skip])
# è¿™æ˜¯æ¨¡å‹çš„æœ€åä¸€å±‚ last = tf.keras.layers.Conv2DTranspose( filters=output_channels, kernel_size=3, strides=2, padding='same') #64x64 -> 128x128
x = last(x)
return tf.keras.Model(inputs=inputs, output=x)
OUTPUT_CLASSES = 5
model = unet_model(output_channels=OUTPUT_CLASSES) model.compile(optimizer='adam', loss=tf.keras.losses.SparseCategoricalCrossentropy(from_logits=True), metrics=['accuracy'])
model_history = model.fit(train_dataset, epochs=EPOCHS, validation_data=test_dataset)

ä¹‹åæˆ‘å†³å®šåœ¨ Stackoverflow ä¸Šçš„è¿™ä¸ªé—®é¢˜ ä¸­å¯»æ‰¾ç­”æ¡ˆï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”æˆ‘åº”ç”¨äº† CuDNNLSTM ï¼ˆä»…åœ¨ GPU ä¸Šè¿è¡Œï¼‰ è€Œä¸æ˜¯ LSTMã€‚ å› æ­¤ï¼ŒGPU æ€§èƒ½å˜ä¸ºæ¯ epoch ä»… 1 åˆ†é’Ÿï¼Œæ¨¡å‹å‡†ç¡®ç‡ä¸‹é™ 3%ã€‚ é—®é¢˜ï¼š 1) æœ‰äººçŸ¥é“ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆ GPU åœ¨ç»å…¸ LSTM å±‚ä¸­æ¯” CPU è¿è¡Œå¾—æ…¢å—ï¼Ÿæˆ‘ä¸æ˜ç™½ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä¼šå‘ç”Ÿè¿™ç§æƒ…å†µã€‚ 2) ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆå½“æˆ‘ä½¿ç”¨ CuDNNLSTM è€Œä¸æ˜¯ LSTM æ—¶ï¼Œè®­ç»ƒå˜å¾—æ›´å¿«ï¼Œæ¨¡å‹å‡†ç¡®ç‡ä¸‹é™ï¼Ÿ é™„æ³¨ï¼š æˆ‘çš„ CPUï¼š Intel Core i7-7700 å¤„ç†å™¨ï¼ˆ8M ç¼“å­˜ï¼Œæœ€é«˜ 4.20 GHzï¼‰ æˆ‘çš„ GPUï¼š nVidia GeForce GTX 1050 Tiï¼ˆ4 GBï¼‰
